Name: palm fruit bunch production | palm fruit bunch | EN15804GD, U
Category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/012:Growing of perennial crops/0126:Growing of oleaginous fruits
Description: The inventory is modeled for Colombia based on field data from the main oil palm cultivation areas in the North (9"276 ha, representing 8.7% of the total oil palm plantations in Northern Colombia), the Center (5"850 ha, representing 6.7% of the total oil palm plantations in Central Colombia) and the East (12"445.40 ha, representing 10.3 % of the total oil palm plantations in East Colombia). Overall, the dataset represents 27"571 ha of oil palm cultivation in Colombia out of totally 336"956 ha (8%).
